Please include your version of Heritrix, Java, and Operating System, in 
case they're relevant.

We'll also need more details about how you set up the crawl and what 
else you've seen -- in the admin web UI or any of the crawl's logs -- to 
understand what's happened.

Most likely explanation: something about your local configuration 
(either the machine, network, or customizations made to the job config) 
has made your seeds unfetchable, so your 'crawl' winds up just being 
failures to crawl the seeds.

- Gordon @ IA

bowser.richard wrote:
> I seem to be stuck.  No matter what I try for my first web crawl, I ALWAYS wind up with no sites downloaded.
> No reports are available, but the job moves immediately to finished.
> The output log shows the job started and shut down.
> Can anyone help me understand why?
> 
> Thank you!
> Rich B.
